paper.title: Constructing an anticipation formula for fire loss in factory-type
paper.abstract: The before fire assessment data from the ARC fire risk assessment system and the financial loss from post-fire damage report for factory-type buildings located in Taiwan were collected. The correlation between assessment data and degree of fire loss (DFL) was calculated by three regression analyses - linear, power, and exponential equations - to produce an anticipation formula. The results revealed that there is more a believable prediction when the fire loss is bigger, regardless of the amount of fire loss or the DFL, while the latter is more related to the assessment grade. By providing proprietors and insurance companies detailed fire risk analysis showing predictable financial loss, it is advantageous for budget management and fire protection, enforcement and should result in the reduction of fire risk and subsequent damage to factory-type buildings.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究工厂型建筑的火灾损失预测，虽然涉及风险评估和财务损失预测，但其核心应用领域是火灾风险评估和保险损失预测，并未明确指出其在衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等金融领域的应用。
